meanings.definition: Not giving way to pressure, stubborn
meanings.sent1: The unyielding rock stood strong against the crashing waves.
meanings.sent2: She remained unyielding in her decision despite the opposition.
meanings.sent3: The unyielding cat refused to move from its sunny spot on the windowsill.
meanings.sent4: His unyielding determination to succeed propelled him forward.
meanings.sent5: The unyielding grip of the vise kept the pieces firmly in place.

meanings.sent1: The unyielding handshake showed his sincerity and determination.
meanings.sent2: She gave an unyielding nod, indicating her agreement with the plan.
meanings.sent3: The unyielding tree stood tall and proud in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her unyielding belief in herself helped her overcome challenges.
meanings.sent5: The unyielding support of her friends gave her strength during tough times.

meanings.sent1: The unyielding steel beam could not be bent or broken.
meanings.sent2: His unyielding schedule left no room for spontaneity.
meanings.sent3: The unyielding rules of the game made it challenging to play.
meanings.sent4: Her unyielding posture showed her unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The unyielding ice refused to melt even in the heat of summer.
